I found a solution for the 100% traffic.
The problem is that most of the flight plans have 1% volume on them. What it means this 1%? Simply that if you put your traffic slider on 1 or more, youÂ´ll have 100% traffic. The only option is change this 1% for  i.e. 50%. This means that if you put your traffic slider on 49%, you will only see the other flights that have a number lesser than 50% on them. A lot of flights have 30%.  The solution is de-compile with TTools the Traffic_AdobeTP_4_4.bgl file and change the 1% valors inside FlightPlans_AdobeTP_4_4.txt for i.e. 50%.  
Recompiling the file again give us a corrected traffic file. Simply exchange the old file for the new one and voila! We have Adobe AI traffic with working traffic slider.
